story.item: by Enrico Colombini and Chiara Tovena

Laying on the sand, you're enjoying the sweet heat of the tropical sun...\n Now the sun is burning harder, you're in the desert and there's not a trace of an oasis...\n You suddenly wake up in your cabin, the one of the 'Neutronia' commander. It's really hot. Too much. There must be something that doesn't work.
